heading: Vacation to Dubai and Abu Dhabi | FREE Ferrari World Tickets

itinerary.day1Heading: Arrival in Dubai | Dhow Dinner Cruise Experience
itinerary.day1Overview: Upon arrival at Dubai International Airport, get transferred to the pre-booked hotel and check-in. Explore the city on your own by visiting attractions like Dubai Fountain, Safa Park, etc. Later, in the evening, take the pre-booked transfer to Dubai Marina for the Dhow Cruise experience and enjoy a savory dinner. Later, get assisted back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day2Heading: Dubai Sightseeing Tour | Burj Khalifa Visit
itinerary.day2Overview: Get transferred from the hotel for a sightseeing tour of Dubai. Enjoy visiting famous attractions like Jumeirah Beach, Atlantis Hotel, etc. Then, continue your journey to Burj Khalifa and see the cityscapes from the 124th and 125th floors. Later, get assisted back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day3Heading: Dubai Frame Visit | Desert Safari Experience
itinerary.day3Overview: Board your transfer to the famous Dubai Frame and enjoy views of old and new Dubai from its observation deck. Then, get assisted for a desert safari experience and enjoy sandboarding, dune bashing, etc., followed by BBQ dinner. Later, get transferred back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day4Heading: The View at The Palm Visit | Aquaventure Waterpark Visit
itinerary.day4Overview: Get transferred from the hotel to The View At The Palm and enjoy views of the iconic Palm Jumeirah from the observation deck. Then, get assisted to Aquaventure's private beach where you can perform water adventures on the shores. Later, board your transfer back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day5Heading: Dolphinarium Visit | AYA Universe Visit | Museum of Future Visit
itinerary.day5Overview: Board your transfer for an adventurous time in Dubai. During the trip, spend time with dolphins at the Dolphinarium. Then, visit the AYA Universe and enjoy virtual reality adventures, followed by a visit to the Museum Of The Future. Later, get assisted back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day6Heading: Abu Dhabi Sightseeing Tour | Ferrari World Park Visit
itinerary.day6Overview: Get transferred from the hotel for a sightseeing tour of Abu Dhabi. Enjoy visiting attractions like the Sheikh Zayed Mosque, Emirates Palace, etc. Then, explore Ferrari World Park and see the park's iconic architecture inspired by Ferrari. Later, get assisted back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day7Overview: After breakfast, check-out from the hotel and get transferred to the airport to board your flight back home. This is where your trip ends.

overView.heading: Discovering Dubai: A Fusion of Tradition and Luxury
overView.text: Embark on an enchanting journey to Dubai, where tradition intertwines seamlessly with luxury. Explore the cultural heritage, extravagant landmarks, and opulent lifestyle, creating a captivating blend of past and present.

overView.heading: Iconic Wonders of Old Dubai
overView.text: Unravel the historical marvels of Old Dubai. Wander through ancient souks, marvel at majestic mosques, and absorb the rich heritage of this vibrant district, echoing tales of Bedouin tribes and pearl divers.

overView.heading: Modern Marvels in New Dubai
overView.text: Experience the futuristic skyline of New Dubai. Marvel at towering skyscrapers, indulge in luxury shopping, and immerse yourself in the cosmopolitan allure of the city, where innovation meets extravagance.

overView.heading: Nature's Oasis: Dubai Miracle Garden
overView.text: Escape into nature's beauty at Dubai Miracle Garden. Admire the colorful floral displays, stroll through themed gardens, and bask in the tranquility of this botanical paradise, offering a serene respite amidst the urban landscape.

overView.heading: Culinary Delights of Dubai
overView.text: Embark on a gastronomic adventure in Dubai. Indulge in diverse cuisines from around the world, from traditional Emirati dishes to international delights. Explore bustling food markets, savor exquisite flavors, and treat your taste buds to a culinary journey like no other.

overView.heading: Preserving Cultural Legacy
overView.text: Dubai is committed to preserving its cultural heritage. From heritage villages to art galleries, the city honors its roots while embracing modernity, offering a dynamic cultural experience for both residents and visitors alike.

overView.heading: Plan Your Dubai Exploration
overView.text: Whether drawn to history, luxury, or gastronomy, Dubai promises an unforgettable adventure. Plan your exploration of this dynamic city, where every corner reveals a story, and every moment is a celebration of Dubai's boundless charm.

visaPolicy: Visa Application Takes Minimum 4-5 Working Days for Issuance (Friday- Saturday immigration is closed - Subject To Immigration Approval)
Transit visa is valid for 14-days stay on and the Tourist visa is valid for 30-days stay. If passenger will stay more, penalty will be charged accordingly.
Client must travel within 7-10 days once visa is issued.
Cancellation for visa applications will be charged at an additional cost of USD 45/- per visa. We are not responsiat all in case of delayed and rejection of visa.
